title: alpha dosent update
body: so i go and open the alpha and it says that i need to download aditional neccesary content then it starts downloading but when it gets to like 700mb it resets again with the same message, ik i have the memory or space for this download but idk why it dosent finish or resets

replies.body: Unfortunately, I'm not up to date on alpha client issues so you may want to reach out to other testers on the [alpha boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/AMiK4QqL-alpha-client-wont-work).  I haven't heard of that particular error before, but in general it sounds like the patcher needs to download updates but is somehow being blocked.  I'd suggest using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to rule out any possibilities with your network failing to connect to the patching servers.  Hope that helps!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=W8F0LAvV,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-19T15:20:34.513+0000)
>
> Unfortunately, I'm not up to date on alpha client issues so you may want to reach out to other testers on the [alpha boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/AMiK4QqL-alpha-client-wont-work).  I haven't heard of that particular error before, but in general it sounds like the patcher needs to download updates but is somehow being blocked.  I'd suggest using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to rule out any possibilities with your network failing to connect to the patching servers.  Hope that helps!
